referrals.title: Senior Software Engineer at Google
referrals.description: Looking for experienced software engineers to join our Cloud team. You'll be working on building and scaling Google Cloud Platform services used by millions of customers worldwide. Great opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and make a real impact.
referrals.requirements: 5+ years of experience, strong knowledge of distributed systems, experience with cloud platforms, proficient in Java/Go/Python

referrals.title: Product Manager at Meta
referrals.description: Join our product team to build the future of social connectivity. You'll be responsible for defining product strategy, working with cross-functional teams, and delivering features that impact billions of users.
referrals.requirements: 3+ years of product management experience, strong analytical skills, experience with social products

referrals.title: Frontend Developer at Netflix
referrals.description: Help build the future of streaming entertainment. Join our UI team to create engaging user experiences for millions of Netflix users worldwide.
referrals.requirements: Strong React experience, 3+ years of frontend development, experience with performance optimization
referrals.applicationProcess: Internal referral + coding challenge + system design

referrals.title: Cloud Solutions Architect at Microsoft
referrals.description: Join Microsoft's Azure team to help enterprise customers architect and implement cloud solutions. You'll work directly with customers and internal teams to drive cloud adoption.
referrals.requirements: 5+ years of cloud architecture experience, strong communication skills, Azure certification preferred
referrals.applicationProcess: Internal referral + technical + system design interviews

referrals.title: DevOps Engineer at Microsoft
referrals.description: Join our DevOps team to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and improve development workflows for Microsoft products.
referrals.requirements: 4+ years DevOps experience, strong knowledge of Kubernetes, experience with Azure DevOps

referrals.title: iOS Engineer at Apple
referrals.description: Join the iOS team to build features for millions of iPhone users. Work on core iOS components and help shape the future of mobile computing.
referrals.requirements: 4+ years iOS development, Swift expertise, experience with large-scale apps
referrals.applicationProcess: Internal referral + coding + system design interviews

referrals.title: Machine Learning Engineer at Apple
referrals.description: Work on cutting-edge ML projects for Apple products. Help improve Siri, photo recognition, and other ML-powered features.
referrals.requirements: MS/PhD in ML/AI, 3+ years experience, expertise in PyTorch or TensorFlow
referrals.applicationProcess: Internal referral + technical + ML specific interviews

referrals.title: Backend Engineer at Stripe
referrals.description: Build highly available and scalable payment systems. Work on core payment infrastructure used by millions of businesses worldwide.
referrals.requirements: 4+ years backend development, distributed systems experience, strong in Ruby/Go
referrals.applicationProcess: Internal referral + coding + system design interviews

referrals.title: Security Engineer at Stripe
referrals.description: Join our security team to protect Stripe's infrastructure and user data. Work on security automation, threat detection, and incident response.
referrals.requirements: 5+ years security engineering, experience with cloud security, knowledge of cryptography
